channel.title: AoE Online Beta Public for the next 20-ish hours
channel.description:
http://www.gamesforwindows.com/en-US/Games/aoe-online---beta/
Just grab it there within the specified time, have fun!
You'll be able to play after the 20-hour period, it's just the signups that close after that period of time.

item.title: AoE Online Beta Public for the next 20-ish hours
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

This is actually better than i expected.
Im a AOE 1 player, and when i played 3 i threw up (not literally but you get the idea), it was just that bad…

Read full topic

item.title: AoE Online Beta Public for the next 20-ish hours
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:11, topic:393974”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=491157.msg3591939#msg3591939 date=1304715470]
Hi, this game is fun. That is all.
[/quote]

Your “That is all.” statement is used poorly.[/quote]he’s a goofy weird looking ginger. doesn’t matter.

i’ve been playing the beta for a while now :S since you gave me the key a while ago. it’s… alright. i prefer dawn of the modern world.

Read full topic

item.title: AoE Online Beta Public for the next 20-ish hours
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:5, topic:393974”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=491157.msg3591629#msg3591629 date=1304691903]

[quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=491157.msg3591619#msg3591619 date=1304690223]
Ok, I just made a gamertag and all but I’m planning to do a clean install this week. Will it still be in my account after that and after the beta period is over?
[/quote]Yes, it works pretty much like steam. After the beta period the game will be free to play.
[/quote]For us (people who registered in beta) or for everyone?[/quote]For everyone. Beta won’t end for a long time though.

Read full topic

Xbox.com

Xbox | Games and Entertainment on All Your Devices

Experience the new generation of games and entertainment with Xbox. Play Xbox games and stream video on all your devices.

Just grab it there within the specified time, have fun!

You’ll be able to play after the 20-hour period, it’s just the signups that close after that period of time.
